message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand that you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $160. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $140, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $140?

I understand that you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $155. It's still a good deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $145, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $145?

I'm not willing to go as low as $145, Bob. I've already made a significant concession, and I think the product is worth more than that. I'll sell it to you for $157.50. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
I understand that you're trying to get a fair price, Alice, but I'm really close to my budget limit. I'm willing to go up to $152, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $152?
